title: Levels from Mark
content:
As has Djaser guessed, i would like to ask again:
Has Mark continued the creation of his levels, i hope? When will be uploaded the next release of them (not neccesarily finished)? The last version of Mark's levels was uploaded to the Internet in April 2004 (more than two years ago) and it's outdated (Mark made one new level for Commander Keen 5 in September 2004 and i still can't download it [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ).
[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Gah.
